scripts.typecheck: yarn frontend typecheck && yarn e2e typecheck
scripts.pull-template-changes: npx ts-node --esm scripts/pull-template-changes.ts && yarn install && yarn typecheck
scripts.build-dotnet: rimraf publish && cross-env-shell dotnet publish webapi/src/MccSoft.TemplateApp.App/MccSoft.TemplateApp.App.csproj -c Release -o publish -p:Version=$npm_package_version
scripts.copy-frontend: yarn copyfiles -u 2 "frontend/build/**/*" "publish/wwwroot" && yarn copyfiles -u 1 frontend/.env publish/wwwroot
scripts.docker-build: docker build -t templateapp:latest -t templateapp:$npm_package_version -f publish/Dockerfile publish
scripts.build-with-docker: yarn build && yarn build-import-meta-env && yarn docker-build
scripts.build: yarn prestart && yarn build-dotnet && yarn build-frontend && yarn copy-frontend
scripts.copy-translations-to-backend: yarn cpy frontend/public/dictionaries/* dictionaries_tmp/ --flat && yarn renamer --force --verbose -f "/translation.(.*).json/" -r '../webapi/src/MccSoft.TemplateApp.App/Dictionaries/$1/Frontend.json' './dictionaries_tmp/*'
